p: The levels of hepatic enzymes AST and ALT were significantly elevated as a result of CDD-induced NAFLD [Figure 1]. AE and AO with all doses were able to significantly reverse this increase (P < 0.05). The dose of 200 mg/kg/day AE as well as simvastatin showed the best effect by decreasing the levels of these enzymes to the same level of normal diet group [Figure 1, P = 0.001].
